title: Quinn Skins Idea
body:
Hey as a Quinn main, i'm waiting for new skins every patch. But my main haven't received one in a while. Last was Corsair Quinn, wich was 750, and her other skins are both 975 ( Phoenix and Woad Scout). It would be fun to have a new 975-1350 skin or legendary . So here some skins concept i've got on the net. I'm not taking credits but i want to share some awesome work that could maybe be worked on amazing skin for our Birdy Lady !

Project Quinn :
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1424733187243/TeslaEffectPROJECTQuinn.jpg

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1424733242139/TeslaEffectPROJECTQuinn1.jpg

Pulsfire or Robotic (?) Quinn :
https://66.media.tumblr.com/a9ac86d70ec4a7e62604f88dd9fb9c9c/tumblr_nemq7j6nVK1rs6p09o1_500.png
http://67.media.tumblr.com/cc9536676bcb9c9f8f1965a06b35e0d7/tumblr_nnm1w4TXDf1s0adc8o1_500.jpg

Special Force/Survival Quinn :
http://img10.deviantart.net/40ed/i/2013/209/2/a/special_forces_quinn_by_adrianwolve-d6fjdek.jpg

Vampire/Shinobi/Warden Quinn : 
http://orig03.deviantart.net/773f/f/2016/222/4/4/quinn__skin_ideas_by_lululip-dadbwj7.png

Pool Party Quinn :
http://pre15.deviantart.net/1a81/th/pre/i/2016/050/1/6/commission__league_of_legends_pool_party_quinn_by_xephrosart-d9sf1r7.jpg
http://img06.deviantart.net/bdf1/i/2016/178/f/b/pool_party_quinn_by_ny_xii-da7x39j.png

Star Guardian Quinn :
http://67.media.tumblr.com/10b7825a522e350cb768cdba8e7e8a12/tumblr_o9a8e8C4XP1uz3288o1_1280.png

Masquarade Quinn (?) :
https://67.media.tumblr.com/1709c665a0164feefcffbdadca7e234d/tumblr_mxhnrqnVqC1t007tuo1_500.jpg

Dragon Trainer Quinn : 
http://67.media.tumblr.com/e0efbbf7bf8bdc35a32fd66e451cb833/tumblr_o87zxiLroi1vub9jdo1_500.jpg

Mafia Quinn :
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/af/3f/53/af3f53b063c09436999a10661116c684.jpg

Quinn Bee :
http://img09.deviantart.net/e82d/i/2016/093/f/3/league_of_legends___quinn_bee_by_isural-d9xm4si.jpg

Bandit Quinn(?) :
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CkFlh5fVAAAIW20.jpg

http://orig05.deviantart.net/ac3b/f/2014/038/3/1/rogue_quinn_by_vegacolors-d75hgfg.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EGZi-8552uo/VEAOxFuFuCI/AAAAAAAAA8Q/5R8CdIM9cJs/s1600/Quinn%2Bconcept%2BQueenH.jpg

Jurassic Quinn/Suba Quinn Idea : http://i.imgur.com/WWFyqC8.png

BatGirl Quinn :
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11121/111217258/4669194-the_cassandra_cain_batgirl_by_alexpascenko-d68qs1b.jpg

Bilgewater Quinn( Even thought we have Corsair one ) :
http://img13.deviantart.net/833c/i/2014/311/0/7/bilgewater_quinn_by_artsed-d85mkh6.jpg
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/8e/c8/36/8ec83669ab9f2c1deb22e3da57ab829f.jpg

Undead Quinn :
https://67.media.tumblr.com/61dbbc4dcc495775effab79bf0a9290b/tumblr_mxzqn80MmJ1rddnjeo1_500.jpg

Blood Raven Quinn :
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=751150

Popstar Quinn :
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/07/ac/c9/07acc9672b93f25ff788867d7a1ab963.jpg

HeartSeeker Quinn : 
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/63/ea/c2/63eac2441361e985346104a106983a56.jpg

Primal Quinn (?)
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/95/dc/4e/95dc4ef1f4d6a484fc7551f6eb6cbfa5.jpg


America Quinn :
http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s480x480/e15/914395_699433390105688_1601103985_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=NzY2Mzg2NTc5MDMwNzI4NjU2.2
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimg09.deviantart.net%2F466d%2Fi%2F2013%2F203%2F5%2Fe%2Fthe_league_of_independence_1_by_aftertaster7-d6dsh9t.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425&height=800
Thanks for checking those amazing skins idea and make sure to upvote and leave a comment below! 

P.S: I've added more Quinn concept, so feel free to upvote and continue to show your love to our Birdy lady. Some picture don't show so just click on the link to see the picture yourself. Thanks !
#Quinn4Life{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
I've always wanted a Ravenborn skin for Quinn.

http://i.imgur.com/BEayzJJ.png"

Nightraven could also work but for heaven's sake I'd kill for something above 750 RP, it's due time she got something of 1350+ RP quality.

> Nightraven could also work but for heaven's sake I'd kill for something above 750 RP, it's due time she got something of 1350+ RP quality.

Indeed, she really deserve it !

Penquinn
Quinn Bee

PENQUINN THIS IS WHAT WE NEED!!
And Mafia, omg this comment is reminding me about all the old ideas xD
Did you draw all of those ?

> [{quoted}](name=jesusloler,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-02T23:28:05.036+0000)
>
> Did you draw all of those ?

I said in the post i just posted picture i saw over the net. I don't take any credits. I just wanted to give some idea of skin for our Quinn.
Ok I didn't notice

You forgot AmeriQuinn... 

I was also going to say Ninja Quinn but Shinobi Quinn looks pretty similar so I'll accept that... 

Festival Quinn (Where she is dressed in a Carnival (rio de jeniero) costume)

Black Quinn?
Yes... It's a custom skin. It's basically woad scout Quinn in all black with black after effects and a crow...  Palette swap basically...

> [{quoted}](name=MiTsuO Akai,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=000d0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-09T01:14:41.882+0000)

Black Quinn ? It would be nothing but a recolor.
Special Forces cause I'm a sucker for gunplay. Why else do I have Special Forces {{champion:41}}

man I wish there were skins for all these concepts.

> America Quinn.

... I mean... is that an idea or an ultimatum?

P.S. Her Demacian overlords approve.

https://youtu.be/Csv1eckyKcY?t=58
If you guys got idea of concept, let me know, or post picture in the comment section below and i'll add to the list !
Added new picture! Feel free to take a look and continue to upvote ! Thanks , have a great day!
is there a reason why you did not mention dragonslayer but dragontrainer or undead instead of zombie slayer? Or Vampire instead of vampire slayer?

> [{quoted}](name=MrHatStick,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-11-03T08:00:56.609+0000)
>
> is there a reason why you did not mention dragonslayer but dragontrainer or undead instead of zombie slayer? Or Vampire instead of vampire slayer?

I used name that fitted the image. Im not the artist and when artist add a name to their drawing, i use it.
dat masquerade though

> [{quoted}](name=jama655,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-11-03T11:30:29.050+0000)
>
> dat masquerade though

Its my personal favorite too.

Blood Raven looks like {{champion:266}} sister.
Popstar looks like a JOJO reference.

> [{quoted}](name=Veltox,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-11-03T12:05:37.352+0000)
>
> Blood Raven looks like {{champion:266}} sister.
> Popstar looks like a JOJO reference.

Pretty much yea.

Masquerade! I want a nice deep purple with good reds in the bird and have the bird be very tendrily. Quinn should have the nice feathers of a mask and be wearing a dress, not a ball gown but more like a simple ruffled dress to look like feathers. This would also make sense in her lore as Demacia's Scout, but this time a political scout.
OMG OMG Masquerade Quinn is soooooooooo good........ i don't have a thing for gingers in particular or anything like that
Vampire Quinn / Undead Quinn could be really cool, especially if Valor isn't a bird but a bat.
Pulsefire Quinn is just too cool.......
Noxian Quinn and Demacian Swain would be a badass combo.
Level 7 bird watching Quinn main, I'm hoping for some mecha skin where she transforms into valor for her ult.
That would be neat for sure.
Terrible. Right down to the terrible cosplay.

> [{quoted}](name=xomp,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=M5wOhm2N,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-11-03T23:15:49.512+0000)
>
> Terrible. Right down to the terrible cosplay.

To each their own. I was just showing cosplay to give an idea for the skin, period.
Aww my old thread got bumped ! Cheers Quinn Mains!
bump this thread for the win!!! go Quinn!!!!!

Ahh!! These are so awesome. I'm always looking for Quinn artwork and concepts...I haven't seen most of these :0    

The macaw valor pool party, undead quinn, queen bee, and ravenborn are my favorites! ^_^  

I'd like a spooky one for Halloween with valor as a little bat... Or some more feminine ones. I own Pheonix and Heartseeker.
these are all fantastic..i honestly think they should add more project skins
Bump!
Bump, this is my old account post. More love please !
Bump ! Quinn skin idea for you guys !
